title: Movie Search App - OMDb
description: This challenge is a great to practice working with external API. The challenge is to create a simple movie search to speech application that requires you to work with advanced JavaScript functionalities.

userStories.content: Create a movie search app that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create basic structure.
Add inputs, images, details tags,.. according to the design.
Users should be able to enter a movie name in search input.
After search input is filled and user press enter, user should see a movie or 'Movie not found' text if there is no movie matched the searched text.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
